title: Show 38 – Nick Clegg
itunes:title: Show 38 – Nick Clegg
itunes:subtitle: Matt is joined on stage this month by Nick Clegg …
description:
Matt is joined on stage this month by Nick Clegg who was deputy prime minister during the Cameron coalition and previous leader of the Liberal Democrats, Nick has been MP for Sheffield Hallam since 2005.

Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
